code: const API_URL=import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL;export const getTasks=()=>fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/get")).then(res=>res.json());export const addTask=task=>fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/add"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({task})}).then(res=>res.json());export const toggleTask=id=>fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/edit/").concat(id),{method:'PUT'}).then(res=>res.json());export const updateTask=(id,task)=>fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/update/").concat(id),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({task})}).then(res=>res.json());export const deleteTask=id=>fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/delete/").concat(id),{method:'DELETE'}).then(res=>res.json());
